title: New champion skin idea
body: With the new champion Taliyah coming out and how she is going to be an earth bender then I think it would be pretty fun if her skin on release was a theme skin like DJ Sona, Pulsefire Ezreal etc and with it she could change forms I guess like DJ Sona so her abilities would change from earth and become water, fire, ice, electric or air assuming they would work with how her abilities looked or if changing forms would be too similar to DJ then it could possibly be just changing what her abilities looked like while she doesn't change with her abilities.

replies.body: They won't do this year's ultimate skin as a release skin. It's more likely to have been in the works for the past century, knowing Riot.
THEN SHE COULD REALLY BE THE AVATAR!
